titleStmt.title: Room for a ballad, or, A ballad for Rome being a continuation of the Catholick ballad inviting to popery, upon the grounds and reasons that could ever yet be produced.
titleStmt.author: Pope, Walter, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Walter Pope.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
